content: the newest addition to our crochet gnome along is the sweet ladybug gnome this adorable crochet ladybug will brighten your mood and make you happy whenever you see it > all the free gnome patterns can be found on our blog just click here 1 > > the free pattern is available on our blog click here 2 the pdf pattern includes instructions for the following the crochet ladybug gnome the small crochet ladybug applique the small crochet flowers in the pdf you will find plenty of pictures to help you throughout the pattern 1 https //www passionatecrafter com/free-crochet-gnome-collection-a-year-along-crochet-gnome-cal/ 2 https //www passionatecrafter com/ladybug-gnome-free-crochet-pattern/
